article_title: Forum: Trump, Sanders and the American political realignment
article_text:
Midland, MI (48640)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High near 85F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Low 64F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

article_metadata.author: Debasish Chakraborty and Neil Chakraborty

og.description: If the 2016 presidential elections were held today, true political outsiders like Donald Trump and Sen. Bernie Sanders (a self-proclaimed socialist) could potentially emerge as the winner. While Trump is
